name: R ggplot2 - spatial
sub: Learn how to visualise basic spatial data in R using ggplot an sf!
description: This course builds up on last week's content. The goal of this week is to get to know the sf-package in R and to get an idea of how to create simpe plots with it.
teaser: Learn more about ggplot2 and spatial data

details.Venue: Online - link will be provided after registration
